message: I tried to use useragent:browser_name() ( http://docs.kynetx.com/docs/User_Agent ) inside a defaction
if I change the code to :
the webhook returns an empty string
when used inside a webhook it can raise an "internal server error"
I'm assuming you tried using it outside a defaction. Did it return what you expected?
it works outside a defaction except in a webhook
any request specific data must be passed in as an argument to the defaction.
defactions cannot access any data from the request, by design.
what about useragent:browser_name()  in a webhook? should it work ?
